title: ‘Modi Modi’ Chant Added to Rahul Gandhi’s Ujjain Speech Video
subtitle: A viral video purports to show Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s name was chanted during Rahul Gandhi’s speech at Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh on 29 October.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Claim: A viral video purports to show Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s name was chanted during Rahul Gandhi’s speech at Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh on 29 October.

Fact: The audio of the video clip has been morphed.

A viral video clip purporting to show Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s name was chanted during Congress President Rahul Gandhi’s recent rally at Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh, is fake. The audio of the viral video clip has been tampered with.
